name: For Ryan
description:
Description:

This is a short game I made about seeing my late friend, Ryan, in heaven. The inspiration for the game came from the song "Tears In Heaven" by Eric Clapton and the bible verse “For, behold, I create new heavens and a new earth: and the former shall not be remembered, nor come into mind.”

The goal is to regain your memories of Ryan before you get taken up into Heaven.

How to play:

Interact with each of the glowing doors to collect memories of Ryan. There are two memories per door. 

Once you have collected all the memories, interact with the glowing light in the middle to go to heaven.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

E - Interact

Note:

The game may take a couple minutes to load in browser the first time you play it. Alternatively there are download links for both macOs and Windows.
